g.text: Programming paradigm based on the concept of "objects" which contain data (attributes) and code (methods)
Code Reusability • Modularity • Maintainability • Data Security • Problem Solving Approach
# Each object has its own data but shares methods
# Complete Student class with all concepts
self.name, self.age, self.student_id = name, age, student_id
OOP in Python provides powerful abstraction and encapsulation for building maintainable data structures and algorithms
